titles.title: Expressing support for dance as a form of valuable exercise and of artistic expression, and for the designation of September 19, 2020, as "National Dance Day".
Expressing support for dance as a form of valuable exercise and of artistic expression, and for the designation of September 19, 2020, as "National Dance Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of a National Dance Day.
